error TS5109: Option 'moduleResolution' must be set to 'Node16' (or left unspecified) when option 'module' is set to 'Node20'.


!!! error TS5109: Option 'moduleResolution' must be set to 'Node16' (or left unspecified) when option 'module' is set to 'Node20'.

    // esm format file
    import * as self from "@scope/package";
    self;

    // esm format file
    import * as self from "@scope/package";
    self;

    import * as self from "@scope/package";

        "private": true,
